content: SAP performance analysis: we need more training for staff, but ROI is promising.
Workday has simplified payroll processes across multiple branches.
NetSuite pilot results: possible cost overrun if not carefully managed.
Xero case study: good for SMEs, lacks advanced consolidation.
QuickBooks is fine for small acquisitions but watch for limited multi-entity features.
SAP IFRS 16 compliance required thorough data cleansing, took two months for us.
Workday budgeting module feedback: custom reporting can be time-consuming.
NetSuite vs Oracle Cloud: summary doc with pros/cons. Available on request.
